summary:
Face replacers, for Aela and Lydia , if you guys/gals like them i have other npcs facelifted too :)

Non lore friendly and stuff just in case lol :p

2 separate files, one for Aela and one for Lydia in case you want to replace just one, or none :)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16187-1-1335845900.jpg[/img]

[b]You will need:[/b]

Hair:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii and Vanilla Colors by Jeir[/url]
Eyes:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589]Natural Eyes by nevenbridge[/url]
Face Skin:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]Better Females by Bella by BellaGail[/url]


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Remember this is only the face/head , and you can use it with any body/armor , i happen to like the bodybuilder body/nmaps/armor :)
Also this is not lore friendly just in case.[/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]If you want the body and armor shown on the pics you will need the following mods:[/b]

Armor:
ADEC Armor n Clothing Compilation by AcDale
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7782
Body:
Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC by AcDale
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390
Body normal maps:
Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle mod CBBE UNP ADEC by Xs2reality
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1337711

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I used the awesome:
Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1 by foretrenty
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554

And the only thing i use ingame for graphics is:
IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim by MyGoodEye and Gopher
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13049

If you guys/gals like these ones i will upload the rest of my characters made with NPC Editor , if noone like this lol well i tried to share a bit for all the things i take from the awesome community here on TES Nexus, ty again everyone for your awesome mods! :)

Have fun i hope it works because is my 1st upload and please excuse my english! :)
author: Beren2612
